chunk: PCI DSS 4_0_1 Requirement Control A1.1.3 Defined Approach Requirements: Controls are implemented such that each customer can only access resources allocated to them. Customized Approach Objective: Customers cannot impact resources allocated to other customers. Testing Procedures: Testing Procedure A1.1.3: Examine customer privileges to verify each customer can only access resources allocated to them.
requirement: Controls are implemented such that each customer can only access resources allocated to them.
